item.title: The design of Rabbitholer
item.description: At its heart, Rabbitholer is less of a product and more of a design philosophy. Most instances of Rabbitholer are formed out of 3 Git repos, feeding into one another in sequence: ┌───────────────────┐ │rabbitholer-content│ (.md files) └────────┬──────────┘ │ ▼ provides the raw content for │ │ ┌─────▼─────┐ │rabbitholer│ (Hugo website repo) └─────┬─────┘ │ ▼ builds the HTML for │ │ ┌───────▼─────────┐ │rabbitholer-pages│ (.html, .xml files) └───────┬─────────┘ │ ▼ can be hosted.
